channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s When Nintendo Switch 2 Pre-Orders Go Live And How To Get One At Every Major Retailer
item.description: The Nintendo Switch 2 is almost available for pre-order. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Could 2025 Represent a Near-Term Peak in AI Capex?
item.description: Technology investment surges are exhilarating and fun. But AI capital spending is above the long-term mean and likely to pull back.

item.title: Google Confirms Gmail Update—How To Keep Your Email Account
item.description: You have been warned — do not lose your account.

item.title: How Will RFK’s Cuts At The CDC, FDA And NIH Affect You?
item.description: OMB plans cuts of $40 billion to HHS. The NIH and CDC will each face reductions of more than 40%. What will you see when this happens?

item.title: Good instincts

item.title: Work ethic vs discipline

item.title: The steps vs. the concept
